title: Digital Transformation Roadmap
description: An agent must create a high-level digital transformation roadmap for a traditional manufacturing client.

tasks.description: Identify key areas for digital transformation in manufacturing (e.g., 'Smart Factory (IoT)', 'Digital Supply Chain', 'E-commerce Platform').
Organize these initiatives into a phased roadmap (Phase 1: Foundational, Phase 2: Growth, Phase 3: Optimization).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a logical, phased plan.

tasks.description: For each initiative, list the key expected benefits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly articulates the value proposition of each part of the strategy.
